extendedInfo.description: 18 fantastic weather widgets in 3 different sizes. Widgets with and without a clock. Widget displays weather forecasts for coming periods, up to a week ahead.Weather forecasts contains details of up to 9 days ahead, and up to 4 periods a day. Weather data are provided by yr.no, and updated several times a day. How often you want to retrieve the latest weather data is up to you.Application supports geo-positioning, and can retrieve the latest weather forecast for your current location.Detailed forecast-information includes temperature, type of weather, wind speed, wind direction, expected rainfall, barometric pressure, sunrise, sunset and the length of day in hours and minutes. With one click, you also have direct access to hour-by-hour graph from yr.no through its pages.All widgets with clock, can also be used as a shortcut to start programs. This saves you space on the desktop. All applications installed on the phone can be started with this feature.New widgets released regularly, and requests for new widgets or features are considered on an ongoing basis. Free access to all future releases.Currently supported languages: Norwegian, Swedish, English, Czech, Dutch, Danish, French, Italian, RussianSome of the available settings:- Widget-background / 50% transparent / completely transparent background- Launcher when clicking on the Clock- Different date and time formats (12H/24H)- Celsius / Fahrenheit- Optional unit for wind speed, altitude and rainfall- Day and night icons- Update automatically, every 3, 6, 12 or 24 hours or manually

reviews.title: Valid license error
reviews.comment: I bought the app but when I went to open it, there was an alert \'you need to buy a valid license or quit\'.   I hate it when things don\'t work.   OK, it cost a pound but it\'s still very frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More options...
reviews.comment: -More fonts -The Y on wednesday -More URLs  It\'s a nice little app. I like it a lot. Very simple and exactly what I was looking for. But there needs to be an option to put in a URL from ANY weather service you\'d like. That and fix the Y on Wednesday! Lol. The words too long and makes the Y go underneath the rest of the word when using day labels instead of dates. It does this in both font settings. Also... needs more fonts. for the money spent I\'d expect these options to have been already added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried it for a long time but the temperature predictions are just always wrong.. HTC weather is more accurate. To bad, widget is very beautiful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clock is out of sync!
reviews.comment: Sometimes the clock gets of sync few minutes minus compare to the inner clock.Hope this bug will be corrected in the next release.Even tough I like this widget,this time it worth 3 stars only.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: help please
reviews.comment: Hi, just bought this app. i really love it, only issue im having is trying to make it transparent. anyone know a solution..? thank you, appreciate it sincerely
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would give 5 if...
reviews.comment: You made the 4x2 widget bigger (the default one) because it looks really small on the large HTC Sensation screen. Also, if you made the option to open the default weather app an option that would be great, too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No widgets on nexus 7?
reviews.comment: I bought this for my zte blade (with cyanogen mod) and it works great there. Doesn\'t seem to work with my nexus 7 though ... no widgets show up for it in the app drawer.  Edit: they just started working on nexus, rating increased - still prefer detailed reports from weather pro but this is a nicer looking widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t Buy!!
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t get any widgets on my home screen - all I could get was a \'sun\' icon.  I even put a question on their help  page and they ignored it.  This app just doesn\'t work and is a waste of money!!
reviews.author: Pat Moynahan

reviews.title: Hangs all the time
reviews.comment: This app hangs frequently. The widget \"has problems loading\" and when you access the expanded forecast it hangs and you have to force close it. Don\'t get it until they fix these obvious bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks very nice, but...
reviews.comment: The widget doesn\'t show current temperature (today). Only starts at tomorrow! :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Shows a sunny widget at night
reviews.author: Anis Ea

reviews.title: Won\'t give me the weather for anywhere I am.
reviews.comment: Great idea, if it worked. I have been to four different cities and it just won\'t update the weather.
reviews.author: Shane Smith

reviews.title: Great but..
reviews.comment: No update in a long time.. Needs better looking widgets
reviews.author: Mua\'yed Jaikat

reviews.comment: Best weather widget for now IMHO. Only I\'ve noticed some issues with automatic updates (confirmed on two smartphones).\tFor all those complainers (why always USA?): read info on authors website about accuracy of forecast outside Norway first before you start moan or use your own providers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Android tablet
reviews.comment: Bought to use with live Google wallpaper to show current weather on desktop, doesn\'t work. Pictures shown in ad, couldn\'t get it to look like that. Very drab and boring. Went to FAQ in answer to what weather was doing in present time, told to go outside. Wasted money. Not a lot, but still wasted.
reviews.author: Charlotte Pennington

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Worked properly for about a week. Have uninstalled and reinstalled a couple times and will soon throw an error and stop working. Disappointing for a played for app.
reviews.author: Chris Carey

reviews.title: Won\'t update on Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: The widget doesn\'t update on Jelly Bean. The dev appears rather unwilling to communicate. If this thing isn\'t going to be updated so it works properly it should be removed from the market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Should have been a great app.
reviews.comment: Best layout out of all weather widgets.  It attractively shows date, time and 3 day forecast.  A key is it only uses 1 row of app space.  But you cannot configure the information.  Temperature is Celsius.  Dates and time are European.  The worse thing about the app is that min and max temperatures are not displayed.  You get one number and I\'m not sure what it represents.  Too bad this could have been a great widget.  Save your money.  Skip this widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Temps (in USA) are wrong, but I wonder why.
reviews.comment: The forecast temps are way off, up to 10 degrees F. Forecasts come from \"yr.no\" in Norway. How can a weather forecaster in Norway get accurate U.S. weather data without a U.S partner in place to supply the data?  In addition, I wonder if at least part of the problem is differing weather app expectations between U.S. users and Norwegians (where I presume the dev is located). U.S. users expect weather apps to show the current temp and forecast high temp(s) for future day(s). This app does not show current temps. It shows only forecast temps, depending on the particular widget selected, for one or three dayparts (a few hours into the future on the same day) or one or three future days. I suspect that the future-day forecasts may not be intended to be for the days\' high temps (if they are, they are way off), but something else, like a daytime average temperature. (I\'m just trying to come up with something to explain why the forecast day temps are always low.)   One star for the very inaccurate forecast temps. A second star for being the most beautiful weather widget, although unfortunately not a usable one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Weather app
reviews.comment: I used to install then uninstall many times cos the location update was not good I decided to try again and now I love it cos it locate precisely correctly and the weather is somewhat correct Still observing
reviews.author: Catherine Neo
